On the other hand, if you're in the mood for a bit more action and adventure, 'Escape from L.A.' might be up your alley. This film features the iconic Snake Plissken character played by Kurt Russell, who is tasked with recovering a potential doomsday device from a post-apocalyptic Los Angeles."
